result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Noah Fitzgerald Turner

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Noah Fitzgerald Turner not in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning appeared by video for Noah Fitzgerald Turner.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm 
Case calendared for Pretrial Conference this date.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.
Calendar call scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services STATUS Report, filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY. Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Noah Fitzgerald Turner appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont appeared by video for Noah Fitzgerald Turner.  Attorney Michael J. Odden appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. 
This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
